nodes.text: The Sanyassan Marauders were a band of Sanyassan pirates who crash landed on Endor in 100 BBY. They allied with the Nightsister Charal, who was also stranded on the planet. King Terak carved out a slice of Endor territory for himself, not far from Bright Tree Village, and he made numerous attempts to find a ship that would take him and his people off Endor.
